name: Essence of Light
description: A concentrated form of luminescence captured from Tower luminescent creatures, used in potions and illumination spells.

name: Essence of Vitality
description: A potent essence extracted from the life force of Tower creatures, used in healing potions and rejuvenating rituals.

name: Monster Eye
description: Used in alchemy and crafting magical items.

name: Venom Extract
description: Highly concentrated venom extracted from the fangs of Tower predators, essential for crafting poisons and antidotes.
